goal.en: Learn the necessary mathematical tools for chemistry
goal.ch: 讓學生學習化學上所需要的數學方法

content.en:
1. Sequences and series
2. Functions in 3 dimensions
3. First-order differential equations
4. Second-order differential equations
5. Partial differential equations
6. Determinants
7. Matrices and linear transformations
8. The matrix eigenvalue problem
9. Numerical methods
content.ch:
1. Sequences and series
2. Functions in 3 dimensions
3. First-order differential equations
4. Second-order differential equations
5. Partial differential equations
6. Determinants
7. Matrices and linear transformations
8. The matrix eigenvalue problem
9. Numerical methods

textbook.en: Erich Steiner, “The Chemistry Maths Book”, 2nd Ed., Oxford University Press (2008).
textbook.ch: Erich Steiner, “The Chemistry Maths Book”, 2nd Ed., Oxford University Press (2008).

grading.ch: 期中考 40％ 期末考 50％ 學習精神 10％

domain.en: 基礎學科 、 物理化學
domain.ch: 基礎學科 、 物理化學

en.competency: To equip oneself with professional knowledge
To posses e-learning and computer skills
To be able to identify and solve problems
To continue to improve one‘s language skills
To develop the qualities of coordination and leadership

紙筆測驗/會考 ， 出席/課堂表現
